attributes.action: introduce Beer Basketball into the 2012 London Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Beer Basketball, is a true amateur sport. Financial gain has never been attached to this noble sport. It has nearly one million patrons worldwide and each one plays this game with the true Olympic spirit. "It is the taking part, not the winning that counts." Please ask the Olympic committee to have this sport inaugurated into the 2012 Olympics.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
